MAN.TITLE: help
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: creates a new index file for on-line help

DESCRIPTION.P: The on-line help reads first the index.html file which contains the list of the chapters. This file comes with Scilab and is in the directory SCIDIR/man/<language> (see man). It is possible to change this index file while interactively adding new chapters. For that, modify the %helps variable and then use the make_index function.
